sourcesContent:
[title]="product.name + 'details'"

Descripción: {{ product.description }}

import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../products'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product', templateUrl: './product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product.component.css'] }) export class ProductComponent { @Input() product!: Product; share() { window.alert('The product has been shared!'); } onNotify() { window.alert('You will be notified when the product goes on sale'); } }
